name: DAC Group
description:
We are all part of a cycle that is seeing a fundamental disruption in the way we engage with brands and buy their products. Technology delivers increasingly frictionless, innately personal and deeply local customer journeys. Consequently, I believe there has never been a more fascinating time to work in the marketing arena, and harness that disruption to the benefit of our clients.
In particular, we at DAC look to leverage the reality that where you are matters as much as who you are, allowing our curious, creative & data savvy ‘Geeks with Personality’ to ideate, create and execute brilliant digital campaigns that help national brands drive their business growth at the local level.
